original_text: Remember what I have taught you. Remember the message that you heard from me. Remember what you saw when I lived among you. You also must do those same things. God is the one who gives us peace in our minds. He will be with you.
korean_text: 너희는 내게 배우고 받고 듣고 본 바를 행하라 그리하면 평강의 하나님이 너희와 함께 계시리라

sentences.original_text: Remember what I have taught you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 가르쳐 준 것을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: Remember the message that you heard from me.
Remember what you saw when I lived among you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 가운데 살 때 본 것을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: You also must do those same things.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 그와 같은 일들을 행해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: God is the one who gives us peace in our minds.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 우리 마음에 평안을 주시는 분이다.
